tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met with Dr. Vathsala after seeing a number of other dentists in the city for a severe periodontal infection which required my front tooth to be removed. I had extensive bone damage because of which no doctor was ready to do an implant even with bone graft.  Everyone suggested bridge which means scrapping off the perfectly fine adjacent two teeth for support. I was devastated after every doctor visit and then luckily came by Dr. Vathsala. Dr. Vathsala saw my scans and she told me I should continue to seek more opinion while she herself gets opinion from others. She got back to me in a day as promised and told me what I needed to hear. An implant was possible with bone graft but that the procedure will be expensive, healing will take a lot of time, and there are no guarantees. That's all I needed to hear, that there was indeed a chance that this might succeed. One year and multiple procedures later, I have an implant. My adjacent two teeth have been spared. It's worth every penny.  Dr. Vathsala is very kind, always smiling, easy to talk to, and makes sure you get the best possible options for your condition. I'm glad to have met her.
reply_text:
Sandya thank you very much for your kind words.
It makes our day. 
God bless you 
Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Toothache,Misaligned Teeth,Teeth Reshaping,Dentofacial Orthopedics,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr Vatsala is very kind and soothing person. I visited her for my mom's jaw pain leading to right side facial pain. My mom had already undergone a root canal for 8 teeth on right side, she was well aware of painful treatment it can be. Dr Vatsala understood her state and trauma she has gone through. Dr Vatsala was very prompt in diagnosis that multiple RCT and metal caps have increased occlusion causing trauma to the jaw muscles. Dr Vatsala was kind enough to share a temporary pain reliving fix and long term permanent solution for my Mother. Dr Vatsala's approach to provide relief to the patient is commendable and she ensures utmost care and attention to each and every experience of the patient. She knows her craft so well and still ensures verification at every step with patient. Thanks doctor for helping my mom ,get rid of the pain while she enjoys her new set of caps 🙂.
reply_text:
Thank you shweta., for your kind review. It means a lot . . .. Hope Mrs. Asha is doing well without any pain.

Your feedback can.help us  in reaching out many more people who might have such similar problems
Thank you again. God Bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Vathsala for multiple issues like Front teeth crown implant, laser gum surgery, tooth filling and tooth extraction. After visiting many doctors,I couldn't find confidence as I had to undergo crown implant for my front tooth. Now after going through the process, I am glad i chose her and would like to strongly recommend her for any dental procedures. She is well experienced, gentle and you will feel positive vibes in her presence.

Dr. Vathsala is an amazing doctor who will go the root of the problem and would suggest only the best treatment. She thinks in favour of the patient and devotes her time patiently explaining the procedure and the diagnosis. She is thorough in her subject and you can completely rely on her for correct guidance and support.
reply_text: Garima thank you very much for the kind words and appreciation.  It is always the  empathy that works. All the best for all your future endeavours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My wife had tooth ache due to cavity during the lock down period. The pain was severe and we tried calling various nearby dentist/clinics. On calling Dr. Vathsala on a weekend, she immediately picked my call and we had a telephonic consultation. Next day, with all due permissions from authorities, Dr. Vathsala opened the clinic only for us. On consultation, doctor explained us the issue and treatment in detail. We were suggested RCT and the cost too was reasonable considering Bangalore standards. RCT was completed in single sitting and without any pain. Antibiotics were prescribed for next 5 days. However immediately after the treatment, the pain disappeared and my wife's tooth is back to normal. Thank you doctor for going beyond your call of duty and helping us during such times.
reply_text:
Sarvesh &  Kinar
Thank you so much for your kind feedback. I really  appreciate  your kind words. I consider that one day was lived well when It was possible for me to  take care of your pain. Doctors are meant to be empathetic 
Thanks again
God bless

Dr. Vatsala was very empathetic. She explained me in details what treatment I will be undergoing. A genuine care for patients and their well being is the strongest point of Dr. Vatsala. I would definitely recommend her. Five stars for Dr. Vatsala. 
Thanks again
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind Review Mr. Ali.

context: Dental Fillings,Teeth Whitening,Dental X-Ray,Dental Checkup (General),Removal Partial Denture (RPD),
review: Dr.Vathsala Naik is a fantastic dentist. I had no pain or problems with my extractions, and she goes above and beyond to ensure you understand what you should do with your teeth and mouth to avoid future health risks. I found her to be very professional and genuine in her concern for your oral health.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor Vathsala is a very experienced dentist. She knows the underlying problem just by looking at your teeth. The doctor explains what the problem is, what is to be done and if we want it to be done right away. The doctor is very kind and doesn't force treatments on her patient. Her clinic is well maintained and in a very good locality.  Highly recommended.

Thank you very much for kind encouraging review. Hope to keep up to all my patients expectations
